src:
Milomir Seslija Sebut Pekerjaan Rumah Utama Kepengurusan Anyar PSSI
04 Nov 2019, 10:09 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Pelatih Arema FC, Milomir Seslija menyebut ada pekerjaan rumah utama yang harus dilakukan kepengurusan anyar PSSI yang baru saja terpilih. Salah satu tugas pengurus periode 2019-2023 adalah membenahi kompetisi.
M. Iriawan dipastikan terpilih sebagai Ketua Umum PSSI. Dalam pemilihan di ajang Kongres Luar Biasa, yang digelar di Jakarta, Sabtu (02/11), ia menang telak dari para pesaingnya. Dari 85 voter, Iwan mendapat 82 suara. Sementara, Arif Putra Wicaksono dan para calon lainnya tak mendapat satu pun suara. Tiga suara lain dianggap tidak sah.
Sebagai pendamping Ketua Umum, terpilihlah Iwan Budianto dan Cucu Somantri sebagai wakil. Iwan mendapat 74 suara, sedangkan Cucu mendapat 81 suara.
"Mereka harus membenahi jalannya kompetisi. Dengan kompetisi yang baik, tentu berujung pada tim nasional yang baik pula," kata Milo, sapaan karib Milomir Seslija, pada Bola.net.
Kongres juga memilih 12 orang anggota Komite Eksekutif PSSI. Mereka adalah: Yoyok Sukawi, Dirk Soplanit, Endri Erawan, Haruna Soemitro, Hasnuryadi Sulaiman, Juni Rahman, Pieter Tanuri, Sonhadji, Ahmad Riyadh, Hasani Abdul Gani, Yunus Nusi, dan Vivin Cahyani.
Bagaimana cara meningkatkan kualitas kompetisi? Simak di bawah ini.
text:
Milomir Seslija Call Homework Main Management Anyar PSSI
Nov 04 2019, 10:09 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Arema FC coach, Milomir Seslija said there is a major homework that must be done by the new PSSI management who had just been chosen. One of the duties of administrators for the 2019-2023 period is to improve competition.
M. Iriawan is certain to be elected as the General Chair of PSSI. In the election at the Extraordinary Congress, which was held in Jakarta, Saturday (02/11), he won a landslide victory over his competitors. From 85 voters, Iwan got 82 votes. Meanwhile, Arif Putra Wicaksono and the other candidates did not get any votes. Three other votes are considered invalid.
As a companion to the General Chair, Iwan Budianto and Cucu Somantri were chosen as representatives. Iwan got 74 votes, while Cucu got 81 votes.
"They have to fix the competition. With a good competition, of course it ends in a good national team too," Milo, Milomir Seslija's close greeting, told Bola.net.
The Congress also elected 12 members of the PSSI Executive Committee. They are: Yoyok Sukawi, Dirk Soplanit, Endri Erawan, Haruna Soemitro, Hasnuryadi Sulaiman, Juni Rahman, Pieter Tanuri, Sonhadji, Ahmad Riyadh, Hasani Abdul Gani, Yunus Nusi, and Vivin Cahyani.
How to improve the quality of competition? See below.
